author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how an uncaught exception in Cloudflare's Rust infrastructure caused their services to go down and by extension large parts of the internet.

Cloudflare Blog Links
https://blog.cloudflare.com/18-november-2025-outage/
https://blog.cloudflare.com/20-percent-internet-upgrade/
